content: @WG-rustc-dev-guide meeting time
Man this year feels like its on fast forward
Yeah, this year feels super fast and slow to me :)
I honestly haven’t been working on the rdg lately
That's okay :)
I have a few assigned issues, I’ll see if there’s anything I can pick up
I feel we’re all in similar situations, hope everyone is ok :)
Yeah, hopefully people just got busy.
What do you think we can do to have contributors help with date triage?
The latest date triage has one checkbox left (though it's a tricky one): rustc-dev-guide#1100
We could write a call for participation on the internals blog?
Not sure about that really
Hmm, that would be interesting, but right now there's so few todos on it that it's probably not worth it.
Ping code contributors relevant to the outdated sections, just to confirm?
I tried asking on Zulip about the remaining checkbox, but I didn't hear back: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/131828-t-compiler/topic/updating.20old.20rustc-dev-guide.20docs
We could try pinging people, but I'm not sure if it's important enough to ping about.
Roll up sleeves and dig in :stuck_out_tongue_closed_eyes:
More seriously, separate it out into an issue?

Iñaki Garay said:

More seriously, separate it out into an issue?

Hmm, what would the improvement be of having it in its own issue?
Not much really, besides highlighting it
Yeah, I see what you mean. One of the advantages of the date-check system is that if it's fixed without being checked off, it won't show up in the next month's triage :)

Also the fact that this point in particular is proving hard to verify implies that more work is needed beyond just updating the date. Still, I agree that can be done as part of resolving the general issue
Yeah, though all date triage items may involve more than updating the date. I opened an issue rustc-dev-guide#1116 :)
I marked it as "Easy" since one may not need prior knowledge; maybe I should change it to "Medium"?
Because it may be somewhat difficult, but it shouldn't require lots of prior knowledge.
Heh I’d leave it as easy
sorry I missed the ping
I pinged some people on old PRs
Should we switch to async-only since it seems like people have been too busy to be able to come?
Or at least switch until people have more time for a meeting.
I just didn't have zulip open
also my life has been crazy lately
Yeah, maybe it's been crazy for other people as well.
Anyway, see you all next time!
:wave: everyone, sorry but I've been complicated with some stuff lately
next meeting I'll be around
one of the things I'm interested is in moving forward the walkthrough chapter
we've been doing nice PRs like all the dump-* work, I still owe the dump-metadata
